name: dotDesyndicator

user.name: dotBrett
user.about: Sometimes I make styles to either fix, enhance or otherwise change something on the web. Whenever I think one of my projects would be appreciated by others I post them here.

additional_info:
/// FAQ /// What Websites Does This Style Affect? This style will remove the embedded Google Ads from any website running them. What is Visibility? Visibility lets you hide the style from being shown on the Stylish Drop-down Menu.
/// Changelog /// # Change Log All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file. ## [1.0.1] - 2016-02-06 ### Added - Removes Display Ads on YouTube. ## [1.0.0] - 2015-12-05 ### Added - Removes All 'Ads by Google' on websites using embedded Google Ads.
